ygData.subject: Re: Clarification
ygData.msgSnippet: Although it will add nothing to the body of knowledge regarding Tinkering, I hereby suggest we stick Clanof1 in a Toolbox, preferably along with something icky
ygData.messageBody:
Although it will add nothing to the body of knowledge regarding
Tinkering, I hereby suggest we stick Clanof1 in a Toolbox,
preferably along with something icky like a whole batch of spider
eyes, and press Combine. It would be amusing, and it might lower
the crabbiness level of this list.

Airgid of Cazic-Thule
10th level Mage
Future Tinkerer Extraordinaire

On 25 Jan 00, at 15:33, Clanof1@... wrote:
